title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), no results are returned.
OB: The search does not return any results when using the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: The search should return the expected results when using the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
1. Open the Package view. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Open the search dialog. 
4. Conduct a search. 
5. Verify that the search does not return any results. 
6. Alternatively, open the context menu in the Package view and conduct the same search. Verify that the search returns the expected results. 

(Note: The search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.)
